ai.beansTip: All AI functions consume AI beans, which are necessary to use AI capabilities. The Standard, Professional and Enterprise versions have a fixed number of beans gifted every week. It also supports purchasing AI beans.

aibeans.name: AI beans
aibeans.buyRules:
1. The AI beans gifted by @:{'common.premium.versions.standard'}/@:{'common.premium.versions.profession'}/@:{'common.premium.versions.enterprise'} versions are available for every Monday at 00:00 AM
2. AI beans which have latest expiration date will be comsumed first
aibeans.buyRules4LowVip: Purchasing AI Beans package doesn't allow you to use the Profession version functions, please plan carefully
aibeans.tipPkg2: Valid for {0} days, please plan carefully

aibeans.refundTip: When the user is not satisfied with the answer, ReadPaper will provide bean withdrawal service based on account credit. High-quality feedback can improve account credit, while low-quality feedback (such as frequent bean withdrawals and invalid feedback) will reduce credit.
aibeans.refundTt: The current account has good credit. Your beans will be refunded immediately after filling in the feedback below.

aitools.pasteErrorTip: Your browser has not enabled clipboard permissions, please manually paste using ctrl/cmd+v

vipLimit.ruleTxt:
1. The AI Paper Mentor, featuring Title Master, Abstract Master, AI Reviewer, etc., is currently in beta and not yet available for all users.
2. Users can gain early access and consume AI beans by acquiring ReadPaper @:{'common.premium.versions.profession'}.
3. The service currently only supports papers in English.
4. The service currently supports papers with a maximum of 10,000 words.
vipLimit.exampleTxt: Examples and product demonstrations are available in the beginner's guide.

aitools.aiPolishTip: üí° Copy and paste an English paragraph of your paper in the box,  and improve, expand or paraphrase it with one click. Eureka has learned over 10,000,000 English academic papers to bring you the most professional paraphraser experience.
aitools.zhAiPolishTip: Copy and paste a Chinese paragraph of your paper in the box, and improve, expand or paraphrase it with one click. Our AI has learned over 10,000,000 academic papers to bring you the most professional paraphraser experience.
aitools.aiTranslateTip: üí° Copy and paste a Chinese paragraph of your paper in the box and translate it into English with one click.  Eureka has learned over 10,000,000 English academic papers to bring you the most professional English writing.
aitools.aiPolishPlaceholder: Copy and past the English text you want to paraphrase, and click the botton to start...
aitools.aiZhPolishPlaceholder: Copy and paste the Chinese text you want to paraphrase, and click the botton to start. During the beta period, only text within 250 characters is supported.

welcome.tip: ReadPaper newly launched AI assisted writing functions, now open for internal testing.

welcome.waitTip: We will try our best to gain more resources and serve more users on the waitlist.
welcome.waitDesc: You'll get a message once we are ready for you to try it. Thank you for your patience~

aiReviewerQS.tt: AI thesis review tool used by both university teachers and students
aiReviewerQS.desc: Spend up to one day to get the paper review comments. Cheaper, faster and more private than real people
aiReviewerQS.demotip: Click to download and view locally
aiReviewerQS.createTip: Upload the file and enter the corresponding information. After clicking the "Create Review Task" button, the AI beans will be deducted and the review task will be submitted
aiReviewerQS.labelRules: I have read and am aware of the following rules
aiReviewerQS.errorRules: Please read and check the above rules first
aiReviewerQS.createRules:
1. Due to the high computational complexity of AI, it takes between 20 minutes and 24 hours to generate the review comments file. If you have not received the file within 24 hours, please contact the ReadPaper butler for feedback.
2. The current task is a one-time delivery. After clicking "Start parsing", it will enter the calculation queue and will not be refunded or refunded. 3. AI review is different from manual review, and the review comments are for reference only. Users still need to evaluate the rationality of each comment suggestion themselves.
4. ReadPaper does not make any commitment to the effectiveness of annotations on the manuscript. If you encounter obvious problems, such as receiving files without annotations, please contact the ReadPaper butler for feedback
aiReviewerQS.beansTip: The insufficient AI beans will be deducted at 1 Yuan = 10 AI beans
aiReviewerQS.tasksTip: For the security of your data, only the data from the past 3 months will be retained, and expired reports will be automatically deleted.
aiReviewerQS.failTip: Please contact the butler for help
aiReviewerQS.buyTt: You are buyying the thesis review task
aiReviewerQS.buyTip: You can buy it by the following ways
aiReviewerQS.buyByUpgrade: Upgrade to profession/outstanding version to get more beans and purchase
aiReviewerQS.buyPatchTip: The preferential price is {0} beans, the current task has locked {1} beans, and the price difference needs to be paid:
